name: Tenebrific
description:
(Made in roughly 2 weeks for the #NoticeMe Game Jam. The original submission was made for the GXC website and can only be played on an Opera GX browser. If you'd like to play that version, here's the link to it: https://gxc.gg/games/ytl7a8/Tenebrific)

Keyboard Controls

Move: Arrow Keys or AWSD

Ability 1: J or Z

Ability 2: K or X

Interact/Buy: Space

Gamepad Controls

Move: Dpad or Left Analog Stick (Analog stick doesn't work in menus, though)

Ability 1: (Playstation) X or (Xbox) A

Ability 2: (Playstation) O or (Xbox) B

Interact/Buy: (Playstation) □ or (Xbox) X

Story

In this world of LIGHT and DARK, unrest between both sides have persisted throughout the millennia as they butted heads in the hopes of remaining the dominant species of the land. Finally, it all culminated in a war that ended with the side of the LIGHT as victors. Or so the story goes. It has been ages since there has been conflict between the two. In fact, the LIGHT have lived prosperously for centuries on the surface as the DARK hid and lied dormant, waiting, for one day...

Note from the creator

As per usual with jams, I did not get to add everything I wanted within the jam window. 2 key things I didn't have time for were adding more items and a final boss fight (however, you can loop infinitely like in Risk of Rain). These are things I will be adding in the future, so stay tuned for that! Here are the links to my other game pages if you're interested in playing other things I create:
